title: Linking Live Form with another Widget for Input
description: To use form for updating the table, it needs to be bound to a Data Table or a List widget's Selected row property. Here we will see linking Data Table to a Live Form, the same can be replicated for a List. Another easy way to achieve this would be to use the Editable Data Table with Live Form layout.
